attributes.action: make Steve Gibson, chairman of Middlesbrough Football Club, a Knight of the Realm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Steve Gibson has almost single handedly dragged a football club from the brink of bankrupcy to become on the most successful clubs in the country ouside the top 4. He has done all this without needed Russian oil millions or Arab oil trillions. We feel now is time to recognise this remarkable achievement

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
